text: Hagi zamagra ana kva vahe'mo'za hankaveti'za Asiria vahera bainati kazinteti hara ome huzamagatere'za kegava hunezamante'za, Nimroti vahe'mokizmi mopafima unefraza kantamimpinti ufre vagare'za bainati kazinteti hara ome hu'za mopa erigahaze. Hagi Asiria vahe'mo'zama isagama agatere'za tagri mopafima efrenaku'ma zamazatre zamagatrema hu'za ne-esageno'a, tagri kini ne'mo'a taza huno tagu vazigahie.
